wt.facade.classification

Interface ClassificationFacadeIfc

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClassificationFacade

    public interface ClassificationFacadeIfc
    A facade for Classification that makes available some of the Classification APIs through reflection.

    Supported API: true

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getChildren(java.lang.String internalNodeName, java.lang.String namespace)
      This method will return set of internal name of immediate children.

      Method to fetch all classification attributes on a given classification node for given namespace.
      java.util.Set<AttributeTypeIdentifier> getClassificationConstraintAttributes(TypeIdentifier context)
      Returns an ATI set for attributes having classification constraint on a given type
      java.lang.Object getClassificationNodeInfo(java.lang.String internalNodeName, java.lang.String namespace)
      Returns Object of type EnumerationEntryInfo relevant information of Classification node.
      java.lang.String getLocalizedDisplayNameForClassificationNode(java.lang.String internalNodeName, java.lang.String namespace, java.util.Locale locale)
      Returns the localized display name of classification node.
      java.lang.String getLocalizedHierarchyForClassificationNode(java.lang.String internalNodeName, java.lang.String namespace, java.util.Locale locale)
      Returns the localized complete hierarchy for classification node.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getRootNodeNames(java.lang.String namespace)
      This method will return list of root names for corresponding namespace.

    • Method Detail

      • getClassificationConstraintAttributes

        java.util.Set<AttributeTypeIdentifier> getClassificationConstraintAttributes(TypeIdentifier context)
                                                                      throws WTException
        Returns an ATI set for attributes having classification constraint on a given type
        Parameters:
        context - - TypeIdentifier for type on which attributes are defined
        Returns:
        - set of AttributeTypeIndentifier having classification constraint.
        Throws:
        WTException -

        Supported API: true

      • getClassificationAttributes

        java.util.Set<AttributeTypeIdentifier> getClassificationAttributes(java.lang.String namespace,
                                                                   java.lang.String internalNodeName)
                                                            throws WTException
        Method to fetch all classification attributes on a given classification node for given namespace.
        Parameters:
        namespace - - namespace for classification node
        internalNodeName - - node internal name
        Returns:
        - Set of all classification attributes
        Throws:
        WTException -

        Supported API: true

      • getChildren

        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getChildren(java.lang.String internalNodeName,
                                            java.lang.String namespace)
                                     throws WTException
        This method will return set of internal name of immediate children. If no children are available or invalid node name is passed then it will return empty set
        Parameters:
        internalNodeName - - node internal name
        namespace - - namespace for classification node
        Returns:
        - Set internal node names of all descendants
        Throws:
        WTException -

        Supported API: true

      • getRootNodeNames

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getRootNodeNames(java.lang.String namespace)
        This method will return list of root names for corresponding namespace.
        Parameters:
        namespace - - namespace for classification node
        Returns:
        - List all root node names for corresponding namespace

        Supported API: true

      • getClassificationNodeInfo

        java.lang.Object getClassificationNodeInfo(java.lang.String internalNodeName,
                                           java.lang.String namespace)
                                    throws WTException
        Returns Object of type EnumerationEntryInfo relevant information of Classification node. The information can be exposed based implementation of the facade.
        Parameters:
        internalNodeName - internal name of the node.
        namespace - Namespace of the node.
        Returns:
        Object of type EnumerationEntryInfo
        Throws:
        WTException -

        Supported API: true
